item.title: About
item.description:
I’m Gavin Rouse — a software quality leader, political operative, and modern renaissance man based in Pasco, Washington.

“Skilled in many, bound by none. A life of exploration, capability, and freedom.”

Experience

Product Quality Test Lead

Cadwell Laboratories, Inc. — July 2025 - Present (8 months)

Leading the technical strategy, execution, and infrastructure of product quality across Cadwell’s neurodiagnostic product lines. Championing systems-thinking approach to quality—delivering tools, processes, and insights that reduce risk and increase confidence.

item.title: Now
item.description:
What I’m focused on right now. (Last updated: February 14, 2026)

Currently Building

  • Treasurer automation for Franklin County GOP — designing database schema and webhook integrations
  • Personal website — launching gavinrouse.com as central hub
  • AI employee systems — refining how I work with AI agents across all projects

Currently Learning

  • Washington PDC compliance requirements
  • GiveButter API and webhook architecture
  • Hugo static site generation
  • Event planning at scale with limited resources

Currently Reading

[Add books, articles, papers you’re reading]

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Active projects and experiments. Always building.

Professional Work

EEG Software Testing Platform

Cadwell Laboratories | Production System

Comprehensive test automation and quality assurance for neurodiagnostic software used in hospitals worldwide.

  • Impact: Software monitors electrical brain activity for epilepsy diagnosis and treatment
  • Scale: Used by medical professionals across 50+ countries
  • Challenge: Ensuring FDA compliance and patient safety in regulated medical device environment
  • Result: Zero critical defects in production releases under my test leadership

Stack: C#, Visual Studio, Azure DevOps, TFS, Microsoft Test Manager
Role: Test Lead, Automation Engineer

item.title: Videos
item.description:
Videography

Modern Renaissance Man — Where curiosity leads, the camera follows.

I create cinematic content around hunting, outdoor adventures, and life events. 301 subscribers, 49 videos, and counting.

Visit my YouTube channel → Follow on Instagram →

Featured Content

Hunting Cinematography

My passion project — documenting archery elk hunts, deer hunting, and outdoor adventures with cinematic storytelling.

Video Views Description
Crescent Bar, WA 42K views Summer adventure and exploration
Bonzai Buck Hunt 33K views Entiat Mountains, WA deer hunt
2023 Oregon Archery Elk Hunt 22K views 30-minute elk hunt documentary
